display_long_description:
Welcome to the Uni-VR-sel-Marble-Constructor my marble-ous fellow.

You seek brutal action in the World of Marbles? Well then it is the perfect game for you.

The Uni-VR-sel-Marble-Constructor is like you think it is, a sandbox game to build your own individual marble tracks directly on your Quest.

Features:

Play with 91 (+ maybe more in the future) unique designed tracks.
Normal Tracks, Pipes, Narrow Tracks, Elevator, Gravity-Modifier, Color-Changer and more!
A simple but effective Save/Load System with 3 Slots for your individual tracks (more upcoming maybe)
Playable during sitting/standing
Absolutely lightweight app Version 1.14 RC1 is nearly only 100 MB big. Savegames probably never reach 2MB

If you would place every Object one time, you could create:
 80,150,775,687,724,724,631,352,622,122,648,436,813,888,337,400,256,824,204,946,344,032,827,440,325,458,733,740,704,428,022,216,465,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000

individual tracks… This is a real number and called 91 factorial.
So feel free to test every possibility 😛



You wanna share your track?
No problem, plug your Quest on your PC, find the folder of the Uni-VR-sel-Marble-Constructor and copy your save-game and share it with your friends.



This game is/was a project from one single person (Me…. Mandrake :) )
